Tips

Little tips that I’ve collected throughout my journey.

  • fzf - Fuzzy finder that can be used to search through your past command-line history, or to find a file. Does a bunch more, but that’s the two things I use it for the most.
  • dot-files - Helpful aliases and whatnots for shortcutting a bunch of common terminal interactions.
  • How to: target RSpec tests
  • React-select Capybara helpers - Directions for how to interact with React-select components from within Capybara tests.
  • React-select with use-debounce - Make react-select wait a little bit before resolving results.
